author: "Arctander, Niels Lauridsen"
title: "Det hellige Fader Vor, i B¿ner aff Scrifften forklaret Syndeki¾den, udi tolff Led forfattet, aff huilcken mand kand see, huad for en farlig ting det er, at legge Synd paa Synd, at en Christen der aff skal beuegis til at gi¿re Penitentz, uden all forhaling"
